Articles.Content: Hello! I am proud to introduce my new company: "Speed Space and Aeronautics Co." or SSAC for short. We here at SSAC are proud to have a company, and look forward to producing some kind of craft for your kerbals to sit comfortably in.
A bit of advice, try adding some info or some pictures of what you will build, in other words, no pics no clicks.

Oh No! I just realized I put this in the wrong section!

Could someone help me put this in the rocket builder's section?

Hello! I am proud to introduce my new company: "Speed Space and Aeronautics Co." or SSAC for short. We here at SSAC are proud to have a company, and look forward to producing some kind of craft for your kerbals to sit comfortably in.

Hey man, even though some people post their company here it's best to put it in the rocket builders sub forum. Contrary to what people beleive it will get as many views there as here. If the craft are kewl. ;-)
Yeah, Rocket Builders get a lot less activity than it used to have.
Have done it, going to delete this one, and make the other one #1.
